title: चंद्रकांता संतति 2
description: The second part of Chandrakanta Santiti picks up right where the first part ended. It follows the adventures of Chandrakanta's son Kuanr Indrajeet Singh and Anand Singh and their Aiyyars. It also introduces many new characters such as Bhoothnath, Kamlini and Raja Gopal Singh Ji.
author: Babu Devakinandan Khatri
